summary:
The diff modifies LandingPage.tsx but the change described in the file summary targets the overlay text 'Informasjon om vår teknologi' (using text-white font-semibold drop-shadow-md and darkening the gradient overlay), rather than explicitly targeting the first

inside the third div of the ICP teaser section with a dark foreground color class like text-gray-900. The truncated diff does not show the specific paragraph element being changed to a dark high-contrast color class. The change appears to address overlay/image text contrast rather than the paragraph text element specified by the XPath.

missing_requirements.requirement:
Find the paragraph element at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/section[1]/div[3]/div[1]/p[1] (first

inside the third div of the ICP teaser section) and apply a dark, high-contrast color class (e.g., text-gray-900) to ensure WCAG AA (4.5:1) contrast.
missing_requirements.reason:
The file summary for LandingPage.tsx describes changes to the overlay text 'Informasjon om vår teknologi' with text-white and gradient darkening, not to the specific paragraph element identified by the XPath using a dark foreground token like text-gray-900. The truncated diff does not show the targeted

element receiving a dark color class.

hallucinated_features.description: Darkening the gradient overlay on the ICP network image (from-black/80 via-black/30) and applying text-white font-semibold drop-shadow-md to the overlay text 'Informasjon om vår teknologi'
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request only asks for a darker text color on the specific paragraph element identified by the XPath. Modifying the gradient overlay darkness and applying white text with drop-shadow to an overlay label was not requested.
